Name: D3D INSIDE 2: HELL
About the game: The main character is Ded. A thick beard, a cap with ear flaps, a rich smell of fumes in the morning. One fine day, the invasion of demons from hell began ... Demons captured the region, any weapon was powerless. People started to panic, but humanity has found a way to kill monsters. Due to an unknown reason, vodka destroyed the cells of demons. Due to many years of training in drinking vodka, Ded's body began to consist of 50 percent alcohol - the demons, touching, fall dead. Also, the CCM on throwing grenades made Ded a killing machine against demons. By coincidence, Ded was sent to hell. There, his adventure continued. A low-poly first-person shooter with resource management, pumping and tasks from the NPC - all this awaits you in D3D INSIDE 2: HELL ! Features: You play as grandfather Various bosses Leveling Craft Bullet hell NPCs and quests Vodka, especially explosive, is the worst nightmare of demons
